cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mada

sentence.kanji: 宿題は未だ終わっていません。
sentence.romaji: shukudai ha mada owate imasen
sentence.english: I haven't finished my homework yet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's imouto

sentence.kanji: 私の妹は小学生です。
sentence.romaji: watashi no imouto ha shougakusei desu
sentence.english: My little sister goes to elementary school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's wakai

sentence.kanji: 彼はまだ若いです。
sentence.romaji: kare ha mada wakai desu
sentence.english: He's still young.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hon

sentence.kanji: 本を１冊買いました。
sentence.romaji: hon wo isatsu kaimashita
sentence.english: I bought one book.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hayashi

sentence.kanji: 私たちは林の中に入っていった。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha hayashi no naka ni haite ita
sentence.english: We entered the woods.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mori

sentence.kanji: 私は森を歩くのが好きです。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha mori wo aruku no ga suki desu
sentence.english: I like to walk in the forest.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kabu

sentence.kanji: 最近株を始めました。
sentence.romaji: saikin kabu wo hajimemashita
sentence.english: I recently started investing in stocks.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shushou

sentence.kanji: 今の首相はあまり力がない。
sentence.romaji: ima no shushou ha amari chikara ga nai
sentence.english: The current Prime Minister doesn't have much power.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kurushii

sentence.kanji: 食べ過ぎておなかが苦しい。
sentence.romaji: tabesugite onaka ga kurushii
sentence.english: I have eaten too much and my stomach hurts.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nigai

sentence.kanji: 私は苦いコーヒーが好きです。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha nigai ko-hi- ga suki desu
sentence.english: I like bitter coffee.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's usui

sentence.kanji: この電子辞書はとても薄い。
sentence.romaji: kono denshi jisho ha totemo usui
sentence.english: This electronic dictionary is very thin.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aji

sentence.kanji: この料理は味が薄い。
sentence.romaji: kono ryouri ha aji ga usui
sentence.english: This food is tasteless.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ueru

sentence.kanji: 庭にバラを植えました。
sentence.romaji: niwa ni bara wo uemashita
sentence.english: I planted a rose in the garden.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kusa

sentence.kanji: 庭に草が生えている。
sentence.romaji: niwa ni kusa ga haete iru
sentence.english: Weeds are growing in the garden.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ha

sentence.kanji: これは桜の葉です。
sentence.romaji: kore ha sakura no ha desu
sentence.english: This is a cherry tree leaf.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ki

sentence.kanji: 台風で木が倒れた。
sentence.romaji: taifuu de ki ga taoreta
sentence.english: The tree fell because of the typhoon.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsukue

sentence.kanji: 新しい机を買ってもらいました。
sentence.romaji: atarashii tsukue wo kate moraimashita
sentence.english: They bought me a new desk.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tana

sentence.kanji: 大きな棚はとても便利です。
sentence.romaji: ooki na tana ha totemo benri desu
sentence.english: A large set of shelves is very useful.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hondana

sentence.kanji: これはとても大きな本棚ですね。
sentence.romaji: kore ha totemo ooki na hondana desu ne
sentence.english: This is a very big bookcase.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's honjitsu

sentence.kanji: 本日のランチはハンバーグでございます。
sentence.romaji: honjitsu no ranchi ha hanba-gu de gozaimasu
sentence.english: The lunch of the day is hamburger steak.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mihon

sentence.kanji: 見本はこちらにございます。
sentence.romaji: mihon ha kochira ni gozaimasu
sentence.english: There's a sample here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's matsu

sentence.kanji: 今月末にカナダに行きます。
sentence.romaji: kongetsu matsu ni kanada ni ikimasu
sentence.english: I will go to Canada at the end of this month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's getsumatsu

sentence.kanji: 月末までに申込書を送ってください。
sentence.romaji: getsumatsu made ni moushikomisho wo okute kudasai
sentence.english: Please send the application form by the end of the month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ajiwau

sentence.kanji: 母の手料理をゆっくり味わいました。
sentence.romaji: haha no teryouri wo yukuri ajiwaimashita
sentence.english: I took my time savoring my mother's homemade cooking.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sueko

sentence.kanji: 彼は5人兄弟の末っ子です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha gonin kyoudai no sueko desu
sentence.english: He is the youngest of five siblings.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's wakawakashii

sentence.kanji: 彼女はとても若々しい人です。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha totemo wakawakashii hito desu
sentence.english: She's a very youthful person.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinrin

sentence.kanji: 世界中で森林が失われています。
sentence.romaji: sekaijuu de shinrin ga ushinawarete imasu
sentence.english: Forests are being lost all over the world.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's an

sentence.kanji: もっと案を出し合いましょう。
sentence.romaji: moto an wo dashiaimashou
sentence.english: Let's share more ideas.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's angai

sentence.kanji: 彼は案外いい人かも知れない。
sentence.romaji: kare ha angai ii hito kamo shirenai
sentence.english: He may unexpectedly turn out to be a good person.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinsou

sentence.kanji: 最近、事件の真相が明らかになったよ。
sentence.romaji: saikin jiken no shinsou ga akiraka ni nata yo
sentence.english: Recently the truth of the case has been revealed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mura

sentence.kanji: 私は隣の村から来ました。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha tonari no mura kara kimashita
sentence.english: I come from the next village over.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gaishou

sentence.kanji: 外相は来週訪米の予定です。
sentence.romaji: gaishou ha raishuu houbei no yotei desu
sentence.english: The Foreign Minister is scheduled to visit the United States next week.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's furuhon

sentence.kanji: おととい古本を3冊買いました。
sentence.romaji: ototoi furuhon wo 3 satsu kaimashita
sentence.english: I bought three secondhand books the day before yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kurushimu

sentence.kanji: 彼女はアレルギーに苦しんでいます。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha arerugi- ni kurushinde imasu
sentence.english: She suffers from an allergy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kurushimeru

sentence.kanji: 強い日差しが選手たちを苦しめたの。
sentence.romaji: tsuyoi hizashi ga senshutachi wo kurushimeta no
sentence.english: The strong sunlight troubled the athletes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sabaku

sentence.kanji: 砂漠ではほとんど雨が降らないのよ。
sentence.romaji: sabaku de ha hotondo ame ga furanai no yo
sentence.english: It hardly rains in the desert.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's usumeru

sentence.kanji: スープを少し薄めましょうか。
sentence.romaji: su-pu wo sukoshi usumemashou ka
sentence.english: Shall I water down the soup a little?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's satsu

sentence.kanji: 彼はカバンから札の束を取り出したんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kaban kara satsu no taba wo toridashita n da 。
sentence.english: He took a bundle of cash out of his bag.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fuda

sentence.kanji: 店の外にまだ営業中の札がでているよ。
sentence.romaji: mise no soto ni mada eigyou chuu no fuda ga deteiru yo
sentence.english: The "open for business" sign is still posted outside the store.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nafuda

sentence.kanji: 生徒たちは校内では名札をつけます。
sentence.romaji: seitotachi ha kounai de ha nafuda wo tsukemasu
sentence.english: Students wear name tags in school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kurushimi

sentence.kanji: 誰も彼の苦しみを理解していなかったな。
sentence.romaji: dare mo kare no kurushimi wo rikai shite inakata na
sentence.english: No one recognized his suffering.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ueki

sentence.kanji: 植木に水をやりました。
sentence.romaji: ueki ni mizu wo yarimashita
sentence.english: I watered the plant.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taue

sentence.kanji: 5月は田植えの季節です。
sentence.romaji: 5 gatsu ha taue no kisetsu desu
sentence.english: May is the rice planting season.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hourensou

sentence.kanji: ほうれん草はビタミンが豊富です。
sentence.romaji: hourensou ha bitamin ga houfu desu 。
sentence.english: Spinach is rich in vitamins.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's konoha

sentence.kanji: 秋には木の葉が赤くなります。
sentence.romaji: aki ni ha konoha ga akaku narimasu
sentence.english: Leaves go red in autumn.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hapa

sentence.kanji: もみじの葉っぱが赤くなりましたね。
sentence.romaji: momiji no hapa ga akaku narimashita ne
sentence.english: The maple leaves turned red.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sue

sentence.kanji: 長い話合いの末、やっと同意に至った。
sentence.romaji: nagai hanashiai no sue yato doui ni itata
sentence.english: After long talks, they finally reached an agreement.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's waku

sentence.kanji: 枠の中に答えを書いてください。
sentence.romaji: waku no naka ni kotae wo kaite kudasai
sentence.english: Please write the answer in the box.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kusaki

sentence.kanji: この庭は草木が枯れているね。
sentence.romaji: kono niwa ha kusaki ga karete iru ne
sentence.english: The plants dry out in this garden.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kogarashi

sentence.kanji: 外は木枯らしが吹いているよ。
sentence.romaji: soto ha kogarashi ga fuite iru yo
sentence.english: A cold wintry wind is blowing outside.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koyomi

sentence.kanji: 暦の上では今日から冬ですね。
sentence.romaji: koyomi no ue de ha kyou kara fuyu desu ne
sentence.english: Winter starts today according to the almanac.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kurasu

sentence.kanji: 将来は海の近くで暮らしたいな。
sentence.romaji: shourai ha umi no chikaku de kurashitai na
sentence.english: I want to live near the sea in the future.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kurashi

sentence.kanji: 彼女は毎日の暮らしを楽しんでいますね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha mainichi no kurashi wo tanoshinde imasu ne
sentence.english: She's enjoying her daily life.

cards.english: dusk, the end (of a season or a year)
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kure

sentence.kanji: 暮れは用事が多くて忙しいです。
sentence.romaji: kure ha youji ga ookute isogashii desu
sentence.english: I'm busy with a lot of things to do at the end of the year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kureru

sentence.kanji: 日が暮れる前に帰りましょう。
sentence.romaji: hi ga kureru mae ni kaerimashou
sentence.english: Let's go home before it gets dark.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuugure

sentence.kanji: 夕暮れの空がきれいですね。
sentence.romaji: yuugure no sora ga kirei desu ne
sentence.english: The twilight sky is beautiful.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's haka

sentence.kanji: 祖父の墓は近くにあります。
sentence.romaji: sofu no haka ha chikaku ni arimasu
sentence.english: My grandfather's grave is nearby.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kareru

sentence.kanji: 花瓶の花が枯れました。
sentence.romaji: kabin no hana ga karemashita
sentence.english: The flowers in the vase died.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ijimeru

sentence.kanji: 動物を苛めてはいけません。
sentence.romaji: doubutsu wo ijimete ha ikemasen
sentence.english: Don't abuse animals.
